SEARCH
Package meta1sd

Class RMIGateway

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
meta1sd.RMIGateway
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, RMIGatewayClientInterface, RMIGatewayDownloaderInterface, RMIGatewayIBSDownloader
public class RMIGateway extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RMIGatewayClientInterface, RMIGatewayDownloaderInterface, RMIGatewayIBSDownloader
RMIGateway - Classe que implementa a interface do gateway RMI, gerenciando a indexação de URLs e a comunicação com as barrels de armazenamento.
See Also:
